title: Trump’s Ambassador to Belgium Is Summoned After Accusing Officials of Antisemitism
summary_full: The diplomat, Bill White, met with a foreign ministry official at a time of rising tensions between the U.S. and countries in Europe.
summary_public: The diplomat, Bill White, met with a foreign ministry official at a time of rising tensions between the U.S. and countries in Europe.
